caption: The image is an advertisement for a pastel bikini collection, featuring two women sitting by a pool. The advertisement is promoting a summer sale with a discount of up to 70%. The text "Summer Sale" is displayed above the women, and "Pastel Bikini Collection" is written below them. The website for the collection is www.reallygreatsite.com. The two women are sitting on a ledge, and one of them is wearing a bikini. The scene is set by a pool, with a potted plant nearby.
original_title: Green Pastel Bikini Collection Summer Sale Instagram Post
